alert.note: Alert for Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 9:40AM EST until February 28 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake IN and Newton Counties. Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Jasper and Porter Counties. For the Kankakee River...including Dunns Bridge, Shelby, Momence, Wilmington...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kankakee River at Shelby. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.5 feet, Water overflows low-lying river banks along Bluegrass Road and in Wildwood Estates east of Sumava Resorts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CST Friday was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday morning and continue falling to 8.5 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: These forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well as forecast precipitation 24 hours into the future. Changes to the rainfall forecast, or any additional rainfall after 24 hours, may cause changes to these river forecasts. River rises are being affected by snow melt from very warm temperatures. Changes to the temperature forecast may cause changes to the river forecast. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/Chicago and water.weather.gov The next statement is expected around 245 AM CST late tonight.
